concept.definition: The request has a normal priority.
The request should be done urgently.
The request should be acted on as soon as possible.

description: Codes representing the priority of the request.
name: DeviceUseRequestPriority

text.div:
DeviceUseRequestPriority

Codes representing the priority of the request.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/device-use-request-priority defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
routine RoutineThe request has a normal priority.
urgent UrgentThe request should be done urgently.
stat StatThe request is time-critical.
asap ASAPThe request should be acted on as soon as possible.
